   <script id="tpl-searchflyout" type="text/html">
    <!-- BEGIN: Underscore Template Definition. --><section class="Flyout Flyout--Header"><div class="Flyout__Wrapper"><ul class="SearchFlyout SearchFlyout--Elevator"><% if ( data.complete.length > 0 ){ %><li class="SearchResults SearchResults--AutoComplete"><ul><% _.each( data.complete, function( complete ){ %><li><a href="#" data-complete-value="<%- complete.value %>"><%= complete.highlight %></a></li><% }); %></ul></li><% } %><% _.each( data.categories, function( cat, index){ %><li class="SearchResults SearchResults--Suggest"><ul><% if( data[cat] ){ %><li class="SearchResults__Category"><h1 class="SearchResults__CategoryHeadline"><%= data.categorienames[index] %></h1><ul class="SearchResults__CategoryResults"><% _.each( data[cat], function( element ){ %><li class="Teaser Teaser--Suggest Teaser--Thumbnail"><a href="<%= element.url %>" title="<%= element.label %>"><figure class="Teaser__Figure"><div class=" Icon Icon--Teaser Icon__Wrapper Icon__Wrapper--Align Icon__Wrapper--AspectRatio1to1"><img alt="<%= element.label %>" src="<%= element.image %>" /></div><figcaption class="Teaser__Figcaption"><h1 class="Teaser__Headline"><%= element.value %></h1><% _.each( element.subheader, function( subheader ){ %><p class="Teaser__Subheadline"><%= subheader %></p><% }); %></figcaption></figure></a></li><% }); %></ul></li><% } %></ul></li><% }); %></ul></div></section><!-- END: Underscore Template Definition. -->
   </script>
   <script>
    if (document.documentElement.clientWidth >= 1000) {
         var rand = Math.round(Math.random() * 10e2),
             writeCookie,
             readCookie;
 
         writeCookie = function(name, value, expires, path) {
             value = encodeURIComponent(value);
             expires = expires || null; // in seconds
 
             var stringToSet = name + '=' + value;
 
             if (expires !== null) {
                 var date = new Date();
                 date = new Date(date.getTime() + 1000 * expires);
 
                 stringToSet += ';expires=' + date.toUTCString();
             }
 
             if (typeof path === 'undefined') {
                 path = '/';
             }
 
             if (path !== '') {
                 stringToSet += ';path=' + path;
             }
 
             document.cookie = stringToSet;
         };
 
         readCookie = function(cookie) {
             var content = '',
                 name = '',
                 start,
                 end;
 
             if (document.cookie.length > 0) {
                 name = cookie + '=';
                 start = document.cookie.indexOf(name);
                 end = 0;
 
                 if (start > -1) {
                     start += name.length;
                     end = document.cookie.indexOf(';', start);
 
                     if (end < start) {
                         end = document.cookie.length;
                     }
 
                     content = document.cookie.substring(start, end);
                 }
             }
 
             return decodeURIComponent(content);
         };
 
         if (readCookie('AB_SegmentNew') === '') {
             if (rand <= 49) {
                 writeCookie('AB_SegmentNew', 'nosourcepoint', 2592000); // g detection
             } else {
                 writeCookie('AB_SegmentNew', 'sourcepoint', 2592000); // sp detection
             }
         }
 
         if (readCookie('AB_countNew') === '') {
             writeCookie('AB_countNew', 'first', 2592000);
         } else {
             writeCookie('AB_countNew', 'notfirst', 2592000);
         }
 
         if ((readCookie('AB_SegmentNew') === 'sourcepoint' || document.location.href.indexOf('forceSourcepoint') !== -1)) {

                 (function() {
                     //window.spActive = true;
                     window._sp_ = window._sp_ || {};
                     window._sp_.config = window._sp_.config || {};
                     window._sp_.config.account_id = 217;
                     window._sp_.config.content_control_callback = function(arg) {};
                     window._sp_.config.mms_domain = 'mms.chip.de';
                     window._sp_.mms = window._sp_.mms || {};
                     window._sp_.mms.cmd = window._sp_.mms.cmd || [];
                     window._sp_.config.mms_client_data_callback = function(cb) {
                         if (cb.info.msg_id !== 0) {
                             localStorage.setItem('spAltAd', 'false');
                             localStorage.setItem('spComp', 'false');
                             localStorage.setItem('spWhitelist', 'false');
                         }
                     };
                     window._sp_.config.mms_choice_selected_callback = function(choiceID) {
                         if (choiceID == '1') {
                             _satellite.track('sourcepointchoicewhitelist');
                             try {
                                 localStorage.setItem('spWhitelist', 'true');
                             } catch (e) {}
                         } else if (choiceID == '3') {
                             _satellite.track('sourcepointchoicealtad');
                             try {
                                 localStorage.setItem('spAltAd', 'true');
                             } catch (e) {}
                         } else if (choiceID == '7' || choiceID == '10') {
                             try {
                                 localStorage.setItem('spComp', 'true');
                             } catch (e) {}
                             if (choiceID == '10') {
                                 var pingImg = new Image();
                                 pingImg.src = 'https://www.welect.de/trk/sp';
                             }
                         }
                     };
                     window._sp_.config.fsm_endpoint =  (window.location.protocol !== "https:" ? '//fsm.chip.de' : '//fsm217chip.global.ssl.fastly.net');
                     window._sp_.config.enable_fsm_detection = true;
                     window._sp_.config.enable_fsm_network_detection = true;
 
                     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
                         var autoplay = false;
                         autoplay = (typeof digitalData !== 'undefined' && typeof digitalData.video !== 'undefined' && typeof digitalData.video[0] !== 'undefined' && digitalData.video[0].autoplay);
 
                         window._sp_.mms.cmd.push(function() {
                             window._sp_.mms.setTargeting('autoplay', autoplay);
                         });
                         window._sp_.mms.cmd.push(function() {
                             window._sp_.mms.startMsg();
                         });
                     });
                 })();
 
                 window._sp_.bootstrap('//www.chip.de/js/spmsg20180529.js');
             }
         } else {
             if (readCookie('AB_SegmentNew') === 'nosourcepoint' || document.location.href.indexOf('forceGoogle') !== -1) {
                 var script = document.createElement('script');
                 script.src = 'https://contributor.google.com/scripts/4df9e4c4fb3b38cf/loader.js';
 
                 var parentElem = document.head || document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
                 parentElem.appendChild(script);
 
                 script.addEventListener('load', function() {
                     (function(){var c=function(a){var b=typeof a;if("object"==b)if(a){if(a instanceof Array)return"array";if(a instanceof Object)return b;var              <h4 class="sr-only">
              Zwei Produkte zum Preis von einem: Media Markt feiert Tag der Freundschaft mit Rabattaktion
             </h4>
             <a class="secondary has-states" href="https://x.chip.de/linktrack/teaser/?clickzone=hp-aquamarin&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fpartners.webmasterplan.com%2Fclick.aspx%3Fref%3D119198%26site%3D14665%26type%3Dtext%26tnb%3D158%26subid%3Dconcom%26diurl%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fad.doubleclick.net%252Fddm%252Ftrackclk%252FN195005.149763AFFILINET%252FB20244785.204282965%253Bdc_trk_aid%253D404036452%253Bdc_trk_cid%253D92407002%253Bkw%253D%2524ref%2524%253Bdc_lat%253D%253Bdc_rdid%253D%253Btag_for_child_directed_treatment%253D%253Fhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.mediamarkt.de%252Fde%252Fshop%252Fprospekte-angebote%252Faktionen%252Ftag-der-freundschaft.html%253Frbtc%253Daff%257C%2524chgr1name%2524%257C%2524ref%2524%257C%257Cp%257CAffiliate_Deeplink-Generator%257C" rel="noopener" target="_blank" title="Zwei Produkte zum Preis von einem: Media Markt feiert Tag der Freundschaft mit Rabattaktion">
              <figure class="Figure ">
               <div class="ar-16-9 bg-gray bg-b-l">
                <img alt="Zwei Produkte zum Preis von einem: Media Markt feiert Tag der Freundschaft mit Rabattaktion" src="https://imgs.chip.de/TzPg5N-9J7RZqNtXO_R66rAcBmQ=/298x168/smart/filters:no_upscale():format(jpeg):quality(100)/www.chip.de%2Fii%2F161%2F9%2F0%2F4%2F8%2F2%2F3%2F6%2F4%2Fmedia_markt_freunde-feefd7a81e4cb88f.jpg"/>
               </div>
               <figcaption class="Figure__Figcaption cf-t">
                <div class="Figure__Figcaption--Bottom">
                 <p class="hl-xs ">
                  Zwei Produkte zum Preis von einem: Media Markt feiert Tag der Freundschaft mit Rabattaktion

            <article class=" fb-col-md-12 fb-col-lg-6 mt-sm mt-lg-so" data-vr-contentbox="teaser-3">
             <h4 class="sr-only">
              Systemkamera superg체nstig: Sony Alpha 6000 im Komplettset zum Top-Preis
             </h4>
             <a class="secondary has-states" href="https://www.chip.de/news/Sony-Alpha-6000-als-Komplettset-zum-Hammerpreis_138977555.html" title="Systemkamera superg체nstig: Sony Alpha 6000 im Komplettset zum Top-Preis">
              <figure class="Figure ">
               <div class="LazyImage ar-16-9 bg-gray LazyImage--fading " data-lazy-image='{"src":"https:\/\/imgs.chip.de\/GznkNoZIeBQKu6u9_X4LNRmuwxo=\/300x169\/smart\/filters:no_upscale():format(jpeg):quality(100)\/www.chip.de%2Fii%2F161%2F8%2F8%2F0%2F5%2F9%2F0%2F7%2F0%2F23997ba3147ac7e9.jpeg"}' data-lazy-image-text="">

                   <img alt="Android 8 f체r alte Smartphones:" src="https://imgs.chip.de/_QclLTCktZn5iWeJLE1hBEo1EcU=/60x60/smart/filters:no_upscale():format(jpeg):quality(100):fill(fff,1)/www.chip.de%2Fii%2F7%2F1%2F7%2F3%2F5%2F3%2F5%2F2%2Fandroid16901-0fd247392021607f.jpg"/>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <figcaption class="fb-col-sm-10 fb-col-md-9 fb-col-lg-9">
                  <div class="fb-cell">
                   <p class="hl-xs">
                    Android 8 f체r alte Smartphones:
                   </p>
                   <p class="copy-md">
                    Launcher bringt Android Oreo auf Ihr Handy
                    <svg class="Icon--TextAppend c-brand" viewbox="0 0 800 800">
                     <use xlink:href="#service-video">

           <article class="fb-col-md-8 fb-col-lg-8" data-vr-contentbox="teaser-1">
            <h4 class="sr-only">
             L채stiges Pflicht-Feature: Warum 3D im Kino einfach nur nervt (Kommentar)
            </h4>
            <a class="secondary has-states" href="https://www.chip.de/news/Wieso-3D-im-Kino-niemand-braucht-Ein-Kommentar_141448619.html" title="L채stiges Pflicht-Feature: Warum 3D im Kino einfach nur nervt (Kommentar)">

              <div class="LazyImage ar-16-9 bg-gray LazyImage--fading bg-b-l" data-lazy-image='{"src":"https:\/\/imgs.chip.de\/_pMryWYOFvqAMhI23FGvH8ERMo4=\/618x348\/smart\/filters:no_upscale():format(jpeg):quality(100)\/www.chip.de%2Fii%2F161%2F9%2F0%2F1%2F8%2F9%2F6%2F8%2F7%2F32f7efdac179b2f8.jpeg"}' data-lazy-image-text="">

           <div class="fb-col-md-4 fb-col-lg-4">
            <div class="fb">

               <h4 class="sr-only">
                Retro-Hit Nokia 8110: Das Bananen-Handy ist zur체ck in Deutschland
               </h4>
               <a class="secondary has-states" href="https://www.chip.de/news/Nokia-8110-Das-Bananen-Handy-ist-zurueck_145079757.html" title="Retro-Hit Nokia 8110: Das Bananen-Handy ist zur체ck in Deutschland">
                <figure class="Figure caption-inside-mu ">
                 <div class="LazyImage ar-16-9 bg-gray LazyImage--fading " data-lazy-image='{"src":"https:\/\/imgs.chip.de\/PumiyYaksPol8lt-REfAFEEOsw8=\/300x169\/smart\/filters:no_upscale():format(jpeg):quality(100)\/www.chip.de%2Fii%2F161%2F9%2F3%2F6%2F0%2F2%2F4%2F8%2F1%2F8452b77bf314af3c.png"}' data-lazy-image-text="">

                 </div>
                 <div class="Label bg-brand c-white Label--Right">
                  <div class="Label__Content">
                   <div class="Label__Content--Text is-hidden-sm">
                    Video
                   </div>
                   <div class="Label__Content--Icon">
                    <div class="Icon ar-1-1 c-white">
                     <svg class="Icon__Item" viewbox="0 0 800 800">

                      </use>
                     </svg>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <figcaption class="Figure__Figcaption cf-t">
                  <div class="Figure__Figcaption--Bottom">
                   <p class="hl-xs ">
                    Retro-Hit Nokia 8110: Das Bananen-Handy ist zur체ck in Deutschland
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </figcaption>
                </figure>
               </a>
              </article>
             </div>
            </div>
            <article class="fb-col-md-8 fb-col-lg-8 mt-lg-so" data-vr-contentbox="teaser-1">

      <circle cx="400" cy="400" fill="none" r="368" stroke="currentcolor" stroke-width="60">
      </circle>
      <path d="M260 575l350-175-350-175">
      </path>
     </svg>
     <svg id="symbol-triangle" viewbox="0 0 800 800">
      <path d="M0 800l800-400L0 0">
      </path>
     </svg>
    </defs>
   </svg>
   <script>
    if ( window._satellite && typeof( window._satellite.pageBottom ) === 'function') {
             window._satellite.pageBottom();
         }
   </script>
  </body>
 </html>
